column4: I use a usb headset... how would I set that to beeing my defalt sound devise?
in sys tools
is ubuntu mouse in /dev/mouse or /dev/input/mice???
the latter, usually
what do you mean the latter?
the latter option you said, ie /dev/input/mice
export install, but why?
I need to install the grub bootloader, how do I do export install?
then X is misconfigured
what? grub is the default.
I know I installed windows on a second partitoin and it ovverit the bootloader
why don't you tell us what your actual goal is?
is "I'd like to reinstall grub"?
yes
I would like to reinstall grub, sorry I was inspecific
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows
in future, ask your specific question up front
It says I will need to know my current kernel, how do I figure this out?
then tell us that, duh
please stop being so obnoxious
and then re-ask your question, with more specifics
do you mean "How do I install the OpenLDAP LDAP server?"?
I was trying to make the new wine
so say that
I got an error someone said I needed openldap that simple
instead of useless vague and confusing questions like you did above
I don't know more than that! I say what I know
sudo apt-get build-dep wine
no, you did not mention that it was an error from wine
This has nuthing to do with wine
it has to do with someone saying that I needed openldap to do my make right
what on earth are yo utalking about?
then stop talking, think about your question and ask it again, including all the relevant information
Flying-Pengui |  bob2: I was trying to make the new wine backgroud, you said you wanted more
vitaliy_m you need openldap
are yo utrying to compile wine or not?
nvm
if so, stop being useless and ru nthe command I gave you
stop it
I am so sorry to spam you guys
if you'd stop being annoying and read what I said earlier, you'd be done by now
are you compiling wine?
I hate when people do, but I realy need to finsh this befor I leave my moms (no internet and I need it for school) my school is above me being nice
yes I am
then bloody say so
sudo apt-get build-dep wine
then compile it
all done
will that be the newest version?
holy hell
I told you this an hour and a half ago
it installs the wine build dependencies
you then compile whatever version you want
Removing nvidia-glx ... Removing ubuntu-desktop ... Removing x-window-system-core ... Removing xlibmesa-dri ...
you there?
you there???
if you have a question, ask it
well.... when I ran that command of yours... it uninstalled nvidia-glx
then it didn't work so I rebooted
then I had to reinstall nvidia-glx
now I have this error
wtf
no
run the command I gave you.  note down what it removes.  compile wine.  reinstall whatever it removed
I already rebooted
I don't know what it uninstalled
what was that command again?
um
you're kinda screwed then
and why on earth did you reboot?
recompile didn't work...
and why did you reboot?
you should realy tell me all of this befor you have me run the command and reboot
I am a windows user
when something doesn't work, we reboot
that's dumb
if yo udidn't write down what it reoved, then it's not recorded anywhere
why didn't you tell me!?
Holy crap!!! I told the people in #winehq what was being uninstalled w00t
whats that command again?
after I run that command should I restart X?
X has nothing to do with any of this
but after I ran that command befor the compile didn't work
infact it came to error MUCH faster
and it still does
oh wow that is awesome omg lolz
refering to an "error" is useless
I am sorry if I am stupid... what should I do?
you need to show the full error message in #flood or on the web everytime you even think of mentioning an "error"
I put it in #flood
I have to go
thank you for the help!!!!
